sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO DW_DWJC_TYPE(ID,NAME,SYDWLX,YWLBDM,PX,) values(#id#,#name#,#sydwlx#,#ywlbdm#,(SELECT CASE WHEN MAX(PX)IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE MAX(PX)+1 END FROM DW_DWJC_TYPE T WHERE T.SYDWLX=#sydwlx# AND T.YWLBDM=#ywlbdm#),)
sqlMap.update:
update DW_DWJC_TYPE
NAME=#name# SYDWLX=#sydwlx# YWLBDM=#ywlbdm# ,
where id = #id#
UPDATE DW_DWJC_TYPE T SET T.XT_ZXBZ='1' WHERE ID = #id#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM R ,M.* FROM ( SELECT A.* FROM DW_DWJC_TYPE A WHERE A.XT_ZXBZ = '0'
A.SYDWLX = #dwjctype.sydwlx#
A.NAME like '%$dwjctype.name$%'
A.YWLBDM = #dwjctype.ywlbdm#
order by $sort$ $order$
) M WHERE ROWNUM <= #end# ) WHERE R > #begin#

SELECT COUNT(0) FROM DW_DWJC_TYPE A WHERE A.XT_ZXBZ = '0'
A.SYDWLX = #dwjctype.sydwlx#
A.NAME like '%$dwjctype.name$%'
A.YWLBDM = #dwjctype.ywlbdm#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO DW_DWJC_DATA(ID,TYPEID,NAME,DEF,PX,) values(#id#,#typeid#,#name#,#def#,(SELECT CASE WHEN MAX(PX)IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE MAX(PX)+1 END FROM DW_DWJC_DATA),)
sqlMap.update:
update DW_DWJC_DATA
NAME=#name# TYPEID=#typeid# DEF=#def# ,
where id = #id#
UPDATE DW_DWJC_DATA T SET T.XT_ZXBZ='1' WHERE ID = #id#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM R ,M.* FROM ( SELECT A.* FROM DW_DWJC_DATA A WHERE A.XT_ZXBZ = '0'
A.DEF = #dwjcdata.def#
A. TYPEID = #dwjcdata.typeid#
A.NAME like '%$dwjcdata.name$%'
order by $sort$ $order$
) M WHERE ROWNUM <= #end# ) WHERE R > #begin#

SELECT COUNT(0) FROM DW_DWJC_DATA A WHERE A.XT_ZXBZ = '0'
A.DEF = #dwjcdata.def#
A. TYPEID = #dwjcdata.typeid#
A.NAME like '%$dwjcdata.name$%'
SELECT ID, NAME, SYDWLX FROM DW_DWJC_TYPE T WHERE T.XT_ZXBZ='0' AND T.SYDWLX=#sydwlx# AND T.YWLBDM=#ywlbdm# ORDER BY PX ASC
SELECT ID, TYPEID, NAME, DEF FROM DW_DWJC_DATA T WHERE T.XT_ZXBZ='0' AND T.TYPEID=#typeid# ORDER BY PX ASC
